Acid Splash.name: Acid Splash
Acid Splash.desc: 1-2 creatures within 5' of each other must make a DEX save or take 1d6 acid damage.  Damage increases to 2d6 at 5th, 3d6 at 11th, and 4d6 at 17th

Blade Ward.name: Blade Ward
Blade Ward.desc: You gain resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

Booming Blade.name: Booming Blade
Booming Blade.desc: Make a melee weapon attack as part of casting. On hit, target is affected. If it willingly moves before end of your next turn, it takes 1d8 thunder damage. At 5th, +1d8 thunder to initial weapon attack and secondary damage. +2d8 at 11th and +3d8 at 17th.

Chill Touch.name: Chill Touch
Chill Touch.desc: Ranged spell attack: 1d8 necrotic, can't regain hp until start of your next turn. If undead, has disadvantage on attacks against you.  Damage increases to 2d8 at 5th, 3d8 at 11th, and 4d8 at 17th

Control Flames.name: Control Flames
Control Flames.desc: Affect non-magical flame within 5' cube: Expand 5' in one direction (fuel needed); extinguish flame, double /halve light radius and change color for 1 hour; or cause simple shapes to appear within flames. Multiple castings allow up to 3 non-instant effects max.

Create Bonfire.name: Create Bonfire
Create Bonfire.desc: Create bonfire in 5' cube.  Deals 1d8 fire to creatures in space when cast, or when entering or ending turn in space (save negates). Damage increases to 2d8 at 5th, 3d8 at 11th, and 4d8 at 17th

Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.desc: Lights shine in 10' radius, within 20' of each other. Bonus action to move them ≤60'.

Druidcraft.name: Druidcraft
Druidcraft.desc: Predict weather (24hrs), affect plants, natural sensory effects in 5' cube (leaves, wind, smells, sounds), light or extinguish small fires

Eldritch Blast.name: Eldritch Blast
Eldritch Blast.desc: 1d10 force damage.  Two beams at 5th, 3 beams at 11th, 4 beams at 17th.  Separate attacks/targets per beam.

Fire Bolt.name: Fire Bolt
Fire Bolt.desc: Creature or object takes 1d10 fire damage, ignites combustibles.  Damage increases to 2d10 at 5th, 3d10 at 11th, and 4d10 at 17th.

Friends.name: Friends
Friends.desc: You have advantage on all Cha checks directed at one nonhostile creature of your choice.  The creature becomes hostile toward you when the spell ends.

Frostbite.name: Frostbite
Frostbite.desc: Con Save or take 1d6 cold damage and disadvantage on next weapon attack before end of its next turn.  Increases to 2d6 (5th), 3d6 (11th), 4d6 (17th)

Green Flame Blade.name: Green Flame Blade
Green Flame Blade.desc: Make a melee weapon attack as part of casting.  On hit, target is affected (+0d8) and fire targets creaure within 5' of target (ability mod).  At 5th,  +1d8 to initial and secondary damage.  +2d8 at 11th and +3d8 at 17th.

Guidance.name: Guidance
Guidance.desc: Once before duration ends, creature can add +1d4 to one ability check of its choice, before or after making the check.

Gust.name: Gust
Gust.desc: Pick one: 1) push medium or smaller creature (Str save neg), 2) push 5lb object 10', or 3) harmless sensory air effect

Infestation.name: Infestation
Infestation.desc: Create cloud of small parasites to appear on target.  CON save or take 1d6 poison damage and move 5ft in random direction. No Opp. attacks, if direction is blocked, doesn't move.  2d6 dmg at 5th, 3d6 at 11th, 4d6 at 17th.

Light.name: Light
Light.desc: Object sheds light in 20' rad, dim light in 40' rad.  Objects carried allow creature a save.  Ends if you cast it again.

Lightning Lure.name: Lightning Lure
Lightning Lure.desc: Target is pulled 10' in straight line to you, then takes 1d8 lightning dmg if it's within 5' of you (Str save negates).  Damage increases to 2d8 at 5th, 3d8 at 11th, and 4d8 at 17th.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.desc: Use Action to control hand, which can manipulate objects ≤10lbs.

Magic Stone.name: Magic Stone
Magic Stone.desc: Enchant up to 3 pebbles. Anyone can hurl pebble (ranged spell attack using your spellcasting mod) up to 60' for 1d6+your spellcasting mod. Pebble loses enchantment after attack.

Message.name: Message
Message.desc: Send message to target and receive whisper only you hear.  Can cast through solid objects if familiar w/target. Magical silence, 1' stone, 1inch metal, any lead, 3' wood blocks spell. Can wind around corners/openings.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.desc: Sound or image of object. Investigation check vs spell DC can determine illusion.

Mold Earth.name: Mold Earth
Mold Earth.desc: Choose one: 1) excavate loose dirt to 5' away, 2) create shapes/colors/words/images in material for 1 hr, 3) make difficult/normal terrain for 1 hour.  Multiple castings allow only 2 non-instant effects.

Poison Spray.name: Poison Spray
Poison Spray.desc: Project puf of poison gas, 1d12 poison damage, Con save negates. Damage increases to 2d12 at 5th, 3d12 at 11th, and 4d12 at 17th

Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
Prestidigitation.desc: Create minor magical effects (lights, flames, clean, warm/cool, flavor, trinket, etc). Affects 1 object (1 cubic foot)

Primal Savagery.name: Primal Savagery
Primal Savagery.desc: Teeth/nails become corrosive. Melee spell attack vs adjacent creature for 1d10 acid damage.  2d10 at 5th, 3d10 at 11th, 4d10 at 17th.

Produce Flame.name: Produce Flame
Produce Flame.desc: Flickering flame appears in hand.  Shed light (10' bright, 20' dim).  Can make a ranged spell attack (ends spell) for 1d8 fire damage.  Damage increases to 2d8 at 5th, 3d8 at 11th, 4d8 at 17th.

Ray Of Frost.name: Ray Of Frost
Ray Of Frost.desc: Deals 1d8 cold damage on hit, speed reduced by 10'.  Damage increases: 5th (2d8), 11th (3d8), 17th (4d8)

Resistance.name: Resistance
Resistance.desc: Target can add 1d4 to ONE save of its choice before or after making the save

Sacred Flame.name: Sacred Flame
Sacred Flame.desc: Deals 1d8 radiant damage, save negates (no cover bonus).  Damage increase: 5th (2d8), 11th (3d8), 17th (4d8)

Shape Water.name: Shape Water
Shape Water.desc: Choose one: 1) move/change flow of water 5' in any direction, 2) water makes simple shapes/animation for 1 hour, 2) change water opacity for 1 hour, 3) freeze unoccupied water for 1 hour. Multiple castings allow only 2 non-instant effects.

Shillelagh.name: Shillelagh
Shillelagh.desc: Club/staff becomes magical.  Can use Spellcasting stat for attack and damage instead of Strength.  Weapon die becomes 1d8. Spell ends if you let go of weapon.

Shocking Grasp.name: Shocking Grasp
Shocking Grasp.desc: Melee spell attack for 1d8 lightning damage (ADV if target is wearing metal); target can't take reactions until start of next turn.  Damage increase: 5th (2d8), 11th (3d8), 17th (4d8)

Spare The Dying.name: Spare The Dying
Spare The Dying.desc: Stabilize a living target that is dying.

Sword Burst.name: Sword Burst
Sword Burst.desc: Each creature within 5' of you takes 1d6 force damage (Dex save negates).  Damage increases to 2d6 at 5th, 3d6 at 11th, 4d6 at 17th.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.desc: You manifest a minor wonder: voice booms 3 times for 1 min., cause flames to flicker, cause harmless ground tremors for 1 min., create an instantaneous sound from point of choice, cause unlock door/ window to slam, alter appearance of eyes for 1 min. Cause up to 3 effects at once with multiple cast.

Thorn Whip.name: Thorn Whip
Thorn Whip.desc: Long vinelike whip of thorns makes melee spell attack: 1d6 piercing and pull target 10' closer to you.  Damage increases to 2d6 at 5th, 3d6 at 11th, 4d6 at 17th.

Thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
Thunderclap.desc: Burst of thunder (heard 100' away), deals 1d6 thunder to creatures 5' from you.  Con save negates.  Damage increases to 2d6 at 5th, 3d6 at 11th, 4d6 at 17th.

Toll the Dead.name: Toll the Dead
Toll the Dead.desc: Bell sounds, target makes WIS save or takes 1d8 necrotic damage (1d12 if currently damaged).  2d8/2d12 at 5th, 3d8/3d12 at 11th, 4d8/4d12 at 17th.

True Strike.name: True Strike
True Strike.desc: Gain advantage on next attack roll.

Vicious Mockery.name: Vicious Mockery
Vicious Mockery.desc: Insult target that can hear you.  Wisdom save or take 1d4 psychic damage and disadvantage on next attack roll.  Damage increase:  5th (2d4), 11th (3d4), 17th (4d4)

Word of Radiance.name: Word of Radiance
Word of Radiance.desc: Creatures within 5ft of you make CON save or take 1d6 radiant damage.  2d6 dmg at 5th, 3d6 at 11th, 4d6 at 17th

Absorb Elements.name: Absorb Elements
Absorb Elements.desc: When you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, gain resistance until start of your next turn.  First time you hit with melee attack (until ends), deal +1d6 of that energy type.  Overpower: +1d6/lvl damage

Alarm.name: Alarm
Alarm.desc: Alerts you whenever a Tiny or larger creature touches/enters area.  Can set allowed creatures and alarm type (mental 1 mile or audible 10 secs in 60')

Animal Friendship.name: Animal Friendship
Animal Friendship.desc: Beast (<4 Int) that can see or hear you is charmed.  Wis save negates.  If you or ally harms creature, spell ends.  Overpower: +1 target/slot lvl

Armor of Agathys.name: Armor of Agathys
Armor of Agathys.desc: Gain 5 temp hp. Deal 5 cold damage to melee attackers while you have these temp hp. Overpower: +5 to temp hp and damage / slot lvl

Arms of Hadar.name: Arms of Hadar
Arms of Hadar.desc: Deal 2d6 necrotic damage to creatures within 10' of you (save for 1/2).  Creatures failing save lose reactions until its next turn.  Overpower:  +1d6 damage / slot lvl

Bane.name: Bane
Bane.desc: Targets that failed save, must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from attacks and saves until the spell ends. Overpower: +1 target / slot level

Beast Bond.name: Beast Bond
Beast Bond.desc: Telepathic link with friendly beast (Int <4) within line of sight. Beast gains advantage on attacks against creatures adjacent to you that you can see.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.desc: Targets may add +1d4 to attacks and saves.  Overpower: +1 target / slot lvl

Burning Hands.name: Burning Hands
Burning Hands.desc: 3d6 fire damage to creatures in cone, save for 1/2 damage. Overpower: +1d6 damage / slot lvl above 1st.

Catapult.name: Catapult
Catapult.desc: Unattended object (1-5lb) flies 90' in direction you choose. If hits something, deals 3d8 blundgeoning to both (Dex save negates). Overpower: +5lb object weight, +1d8 damage / lvl

Cause Fear.name: Cause Fear
Cause Fear.desc: Target makes WIS save or becomes frightened of you until spell ends.  May repeat save at end of its turns to end. Undead/Constructs immune.  Overpower: +1 additional creature per slot level above 1st (within 30ft of each other).

Ceremony.name: Ceremony
Ceremony.desc: Choose 1  rite - Atonement: Restore alignment (DC20 Wis check); Bless Water: turn vial of water holy; Coming of Age: 1/life, target gets +d4 to ability checks for 24 hrs; Dedication: 1/life, target gains +d4 to saves for 24 hrs; Funeral Rite: target cannot become undead for 7 days; Wedding: next 7 days, targets gain +2 AC within 30ft (1/marriage)

Chaos Bolt.name: Chaos Bolt
Chaos Bolt.desc: Bolt shoots target for 2d8+1d6 damage.  Roll 1d8 twice for damage type (choose):  1=Acid, 2=Cold, 3=Fire, 4=Force, 5=Lightning, 6=Poison, 7=Psychic, 8=Thunder.  If you roll doubles, energy leaps to another creature (30') you choose. Make new attack and rolls.  Overpower: +1d6 extra damage/lvl

Charm Person.name: Charm Person
Charm Person.desc: Charm visible humanoid within range for duration or until harmed. Targets being fought by your party save with adv. Overpower: +1 target / slot lvl >1st, must be in range of 1st target

Chromatic Orb.name: Chromatic Orb
Chromatic Orb.desc: Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder - hurl orb as ranged spell attack.  On hit, deals 3d8 of that energy type.  Overpower: +1d8 / lvl

Color Spray.name: Color Spray
Color Spray.desc: Blind 6d10 hp worth of creatures. Start with lowest hp first and go up, dropping any left over. Overpower: +2d10 hp / slot lvl > 1st

Command.name: Command
Command.desc: Visible creature in range obeys 1-word command (language dependent). Undead and harmful commands fail.  Overpower: +1 target within 30' of 1st target / slot lvl > 1st

Compelled Duel.name: Compelled Duel
Compelled Duel.desc: Creature you can see within range has disadvantage vs anyone but you, must make Wis save to move more than 30' away from you. Spell ends if you attack or target other hostile creatures, if a friendly damages/casts a harmful spell on it, or if you end your turn 30' away from it.

Comprehend Languages.name: Comprehend Languages
Comprehend Languages.desc: Understand any spoken language you hear or written language you see. Takes about 1 min to read one page of text.

Create or Destroy Water.name: Create or Destroy Water
Create or Destroy Water.desc: Create or destroy water in open container, or create 30' cube rain or destroy 30' cube of fog.  Overpower: +10 gallons or +5' cube

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.desc: Target is healed 1d8+ ability modifier.  Overpower: +1d8 / lvl

Detect Evil/Good.name: Detect Evil/Good
Detect Evil/Good.desc: Detect aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead, as well as consecrated/desecrated areas

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.desc: Detect presence of magic. Use action to see auras and school of magic.

Detect Poison and Disease.name: Detect Poison and Disease
Detect Poison and Disease.desc: Detect presence and identity of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.desc: You make yourself, including possessions, look different.  You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs.  This does not trick physical inspection.  Creatures can use an action to use Investigation vs your spell DC.

Dissonant Whispers.name: Dissonant Whispers
Dissonant Whispers.desc: Target takes 3d6 psychic dmg and must immediately use its reaction if available to move away from you at full speed.  On successful save, it takes half damage.  Deaf creatures automatically succeed. Overpower: +1d6 dmg.

Divine Favor.name: Divine Favor
Divine Favor.desc: Weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage on hit

Earth Tremor.name: Earth Tremor
Earth Tremor.desc: Each creature in area (other than you) takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone (Dex save for no effect).  Overpower: +1d6 dmg/lvl

Ensnaring Strike.name: Ensnaring Strike
Ensnaring Strike.desc: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack, they are ensnared (Str Dex negates).  Large + creatures have advantage on save. While restrained, target takes 1d6 piercing damage at start of its turns. Str check by creature or allies to break free with Action.  Overpower: +1d6 dmg / lvl

Entangle.name: Entangle
Entangle.desc: Plants turn area into difficult terrain. Creatures in area when cast must make Str save or be restrained; can use action to make Str check against spell DC and free itself.

Expeditious Retreat.name: Expeditious Retreat
Expeditious Retreat.desc: Take Dash action as a bonus action

Faerie Fire.name: Faerie Fire
Faerie Fire.desc: Outlines alll in colored light that negates concealment.  Creatures allowed a save to negate.  Attacks vs visible creatures have advantage.

Feather Fall.name: Feather Fall
Feather Fall.desc: Creatures' descent slows to 60' per round; if the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and lands on its feat, and the spell ends.

Find Familiar.name: Find Familiar
Find Familiar.desc: You gain the service of a familiar.

Fog Cloud.name: Fog Cloud
Fog Cloud.desc: Area is heavily obscured, spreads around corners.  Moderate wind disperses.  Overpower: +20' radius / lvl

Goodberry.name: Goodberry
Goodberry.desc: Create up to 10 magic berries.  Each heal 1 hp and provide nourishment for 1 day.

Grease.name: Grease
Grease.desc: Grease covers 10' sq., area is difficult terrain. On cast, creature in area save or fall prone. Creature that enters or ends turn must also save or fall prone.

Guiding Bolt.name: Guiding Bolt
Guiding Bolt.desc: On hit, target takes 4d6 radiant damage, next attack roll against target before end of next turn has advantage.  Overpower: +1d6 damage / lvl

Hail of Thorns.name: Hail of Thorns
Hail of Thorns.desc: The nex time you hit a creature with a weapon attack, bursts and damages all within 5' (plus target) for 1d10 piercing (Dex save for 1/2).  Overpower:  +1d10 dmg / lvl

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.desc: Heals 1d4 + spell casting ability mod.  Overpower: +1d4 healing / lvl

Hellish Rebuke.name: Hellish Rebuke
Hellish Rebuke.desc: Creature that just damaged you takes 2d10 fire damage (Dex save for 1/2).  Overpower: +1d10 damage / lvl

Heroism.name: Heroism
Heroism.desc: Creature is immune to being frightened, gains temp HP equal to your spellcasting ability modifier at the start of its turns.  The target loses any remaining temp HP when the spell ends.

Hex.name: Hex
Hex.desc: Curse target, deal +1d6 nectrotic dmg when you hit with an attack.  Target has disadvantage on ability checks of 1 type (choose stat).  Can move hex as bonus action if target dies. Overpower: 3rd level (8hrs) 5th level (24hrs)

Hunter's Mark.name: Hunter's Mark
Hunter's Mark.desc: Deal +1d6 dmg when you hit with an attack.  Advantage on any Perception/Survival check to find it.  Can move hex as bonus action if target dies.  Overpower: 3rd level (8hrs) 5th level (24hrs)

Identify.name: Identify
Identify.desc: Learn properties, charges, use of a magic item, or spells affecting a creature or object.

Illusory Script.name: Illusory Script
Illusory Script.desc: You write on the paper, and you and any creatures you designate see the writing normally; everyone else sees it as an unintelligible script.  If dispelled, the original script disappears.  Truesight allows a target to read the writing normally.

Inflict Wounds.name: Inflict Wounds
Inflict Wounds.desc: Deals 3d10 necrotic damage.  Overpower: +1d10 damage / lvl

Jump.name: Jump
Jump.desc: Touched creature's jump distance is tripled

Longstrider.name: Longstrider
Longstrider.desc: Target's speed increases by 10' .  Overpower: +1 creature / lvl

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.desc: AC becomes 13+Dex. Ends if armor is worn.

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.desc: Each dart deals 1d4+1 force damage. Overpower: +1 dart / lvl

Protection from Evil/Good.name: Protection from Evil/Good
Protection from Evil/Good.desc: Aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, undead have attack disadvantage vs target.  Target can't be charmed, frightened, or possessed by them, and gains advantage on new saving throws if already affected.

Purify Food/Drink.name: Purify Food/Drink
Purify Food/Drink.desc: Renders food and drink free of poison and disease

Ray of Sickness.name: Ray of Sickness
Ray of Sickness.desc: Ranged spell attack:  2d8 poison damage & save or be poisoned until end of your next turn.  Overpower:  +1d8 / lvl

Sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
Sanctuary.desc: Creatures attacking target must make save or choose new target. Ends if creature makes attack or casts a spell that affects enemy.

Searing Smite.name: Searing Smite
Searing Smite.desc:
On next melee hit, the attack deals an extra 1d6 fire and ignites target.  At the start of each of its turns until the spell ends, target makes a ave or takes 1d6 fire damage.  On a successful save, the spell ends.  The target or another creature may use an action to put out the flames.
Overpower: +1d6 dmg on initial hit

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.desc: Until start of next turn, gain +5 bonus to AC, including against triggering attack. Immune to magic missile.

Shield of Faith.name: Shield of Faith
Shield of Faith.desc: gain +2 bonus to AC for duration

Silent Image.name: Silent Image
Silent Image.desc: Create a silent image of an object, creature, or phenom.  Action to move, may make movement seem natural.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.desc: Affects 5d8 HP in ascending order of current HP.  Creatures fall unconscious.

Snare.name: Snare
Snare.desc: Use rope to make circle on ground. Rope becomes invisible trap (Investigation check vs spell DC to spot). Triggers on Large or smaller creature .  DEX save or be magically hoisted into air, hanging 3ft from ground until spell ends.  Restrained creature makes DEX save at end of its turn to break free, or have ally help (Arcana vs DC) to end it.

Speak with Animals.name: Speak with Animals
Speak with Animals.desc: Comprehend and communicate with Beasts. Limited by intelligence. Does not charm.

Tasha's Hideous Laughter.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
Tasha's Hideous Laughter.desc: Creature falls prone laughing (incapacitated).  Wis save negates.  Int <5 is immune.  At end of turn and each time it takes damage, gets another save to shake.  Advantage to save if damaged.

Tenser's Floating Disk.name: Tenser's Floating Disk
Tenser's Floating Disk.desc: You create a hovering 3' disk of force.  It can carry 500lb of weight and follows you (20')

Thunderous Smite.name: Thunderous Smite
Thunderous Smite.desc: On next melee hit, you deal an extra 2d6 thunder damage.  Target must succeed on Str save or be pushed 10' away and knocked prone.  Makes an audible noise up w/in 300' of you.

Thunderwave.name: Thunderwave
Thunderwave.desc: Creatures in area that fail a save take 2d8 thunder and pushed 10' away from you.  Half damage on save and are not pushed.

Unseen Servant.name: Unseen Servant
Unseen Servant.desc: Creates invisible, mindless, shapeless force (AC 10, 1 HP, Str 2, no attacks).  Bonus action: command it to move 15' and interact with objects.  Dispells if moves out of range.

Witch Bolt.name: Witch Bolt
Witch Bolt.desc: Ranged spell attack.  Hit deals 1d12 lightning damage and on each of your turns, use action to deal 1d12 damage automatically. Ends if you use action for something else, exceed range, or target has total cover.  Overpower: +1d12 initial damage / lvl

Wrathful Smite.name: Wrathful Smite
Wrathful Smite.desc: On next melee hit, you deal an extra 1d6 psychic damage.  If the target is a creature, it must make a Wis save or be frightened of you until the spell ends.  As an action, creature can make a Wis check against your spell save DC to end the spell.

Zephyr Strike.name: Zephyr Strike
Zephyr Strike.desc: Your movement doesn't provoke Opp attacks. Once before spell ends, give yourself advantage on one weapon attack roll on your turn with +1d8 force damage and +30ft move until end of turn.

Aganazzar's Scorcher.name: Aganazzar's Scorcher
Aganazzar's Scorcher.desc: A line flame emanates from you in a direction you choose. Deals 3d8 fire to creatures in 30ft line, DEX save for 1/2 damage. Overpower: +1d8 dmg / lvl above 2nd.

Aid.name: Aid
Aid.desc: Gain 5 max and current hp. Over power: +5 hp / slot level.

Alter Self.name: Alter Self
Alter Self.desc: You assume a new form: Aquatic Adaptation--breath water, swim speed is walking speed. Changed appearance--change features up to looking like different race of same size. Natural Weapons--Choose claws, fangs, etc. Unarmed strike deals d6 dam. and you are proficient. Weapon is +1 and magic.

Animal Messenger.name: Animal Messenger
Animal Messenger.desc: Target beast travels for spell duration toward a specified location and creature you describe. 50 miles per 24 hours for a flying messenger, or 25 miles for other animals. If it makes it to the described, it delivers a message up to 25 words in your voice. Overpower: +48 hr duration / slot level.

Arcane Lock.name: Arcane Lock
Arcane Lock.desc: Object is locked to everyone but creatures you specify.  May specify spoken p/w, which supresses lock for 1 min. Increases open DC by 10.

Augury.name: Augury
Augury.desc: Portents Weal/Woe of action in next 30 mins

Barkskin.name: Barkskin
Barkskin.desc: Target's skin turns barklike.  AC can't be less than 16.

Beast Sense.name: Beast Sense
Beast Sense.desc: Touch willing beast. See through beast's eyes and ears, including special senses.

Blindness/Deafness.name: Blindness/Deafness
Blindness/Deafness.desc: Visible target is blinded or deafened.  Target makes a Con save at the end of each turn to end the spell. Overpower: 1 add'l creature / slot level > 2nd level.

Blur.name: Blur
Blur.desc: Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. Attacker immune if doesn't rely on sight, as with blindsight, or can see through illusions, as with truesight.

Branding Smite.name: Branding Smite
Branding Smite.desc: On next melee hit, you deal an extra 2d6 radiant to the target, which stop being invisible and sheds dim light in a 5' rad, and can't become invisible until the spell ends. Overpower: +1d6 dam / slot level > 2nd

Calm Emotions.name: Calm Emotions
Calm Emotions.desc: Each humanoid in area; can suppress charm or fright, or make a target indifferent from being hostile unless it or its friends are harmed.

Cloud of Daggers.name: Cloud of Daggers
Cloud of Daggers.desc: Creatures take 4d4 slashing damage when entering the area or starting its turn there. Overpower: +2d4 damage / slot level > 2nd.

Continual Flame.name: Continual Flame
Continual Flame.desc: You create a flame as bright as a torch on a target object.  It creates no heat and uses no oxygen.

Cordon of Arrows.name: Cordon of Arrows
Cordon of Arrows.desc: Plant arrows or bolts into ground. When another creature approaches within 40' for first time on turn (or ends turn there), 1 ammo shoots it.  Dex save or take 1d6 piercing (destroys ammo). Can specify creatures to ignore. Overpower: +2 ammo

Crown of Madness.name: Crown of Madness
Crown of Madness.desc: Target is charmed by you; a twisted crown of jagged iron appears on its head.  Target must make a melee attack vs a creature other than itself that you choose before moving.  It can act normally if none are in range.  You must use your action to maintain control over the target or the spell ends.  The target gets a Wis save at the end of each turn to end the spell.

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.desc: Darkness radiates, blocks light and vision. Can be covered. Dispels lvl 2 or lower lights.

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.desc: You focus your mind on an intelligent creature that you can see.  You initially learn surface thoughts.  It gets a wis save to resist further probing; if it fails, you gain insight into reasoning, emotional state, and something that looms large in its mind.  Creature can use action on its turn to make an Int check vs your Int check; if it succeeds, the spell ends. You can also use this spell to detect the presence of thinking creatures you can't see.

Dragon's Breath.name: Dragon's Breath
Dragon's Breath.desc: Target willing creature touched gains breath attack (action) in 15' cone for 3d6 damage (Type choice:  Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison), DEX save for 1/2. Overpower:  +1d6 dmg per slot above 2nd

Dust Devil.name: Dust Devil
Dust Devil.desc: Elemental appears in space. Creature ending turn adjacent to devil takes 1d8 bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10' away (Str save for 1/2 and no push).  Bonus action: move devil 30'. Blows around sand, gravel, loose dirt into 10' radius cloud (heavily obscured).  Overpower: +1d8 dmg/lvl

Earthbind.name: Earthbind
Earthbind.desc: Target's fly speed is 0 (Str save negates). Airborne creatures descend 60' per round (don't fall(

Enhance Ability.name: Enhance Ability
Enhance Ability.desc: Target gans one of the following:  Bear's Endurance: Adv Con checks, +2d6 temp hp; Bull's Strength: Adv Str checks, x2 carrying capacity; Cat's Grace: Adv Dex checks, ignores 20' fall dmg; Eagle Splendor: Adv Cha checks; Fox's Cunning: Adv Int checks; Owl's Wisdom: Adv Wis checks. Overpower: +1 target

Enlarge/Reduce.name: Enlarge/Reduce
Enlarge/Reduce.desc: Target grows/shrinks. Object cannot be carried. Unwilling target gets save, if saves, no effect. If target is creature, everything wearing/carrying also affected. Items revert to normal size when dropped. Enlarge: double all dimensions, 8X wgt., increase one size category. Adv. on Str checks and saves. Weapons +d4 dam. Reduce: halve all dimensions, 1/8X wgt., disadv. on Str checks and saves, Weapons -d4 (min. 1 damage)

Enthrall.name: Enthrall
Enthrall.desc: Targets have disadvantage on Perception checks made to perceive any creature other than you.  The spell ends if you stop speaking.  Creatures you are fighting have advantage on the save.

Find Steed.name: Find Steed
Find Steed.desc: Summon a spirit steed that you choose the form.  It is celestial, fey, or fiend; intelligence becomes a 6 if lower, and understand one language you speak.

Find Traps.name: Find Traps
Find Traps.desc: You sense the presence of any trap in range, but not the location.

Flame Blade.name: Flame Blade
Flame Blade.desc: Summon firey scimitar.  Grants melee spell attack for 3d6 fire damage.  Sheds light (bright 10', dim 20').  Overpower:  +1d6 damage at 4th, 6th, 8th level slots

Flaming Sphere.name: Flaming Sphere
Flaming Sphere.desc: Creatures adjacent to sphere at end of their turn take 2d6 fire damage, save for 1/2. Move sphere 30' as bonus action. Creatures hit by sphere take damage (save for 1/2). Sheds light 20' rad. Ignites combustibles. Overpower: +1d6 damage / lvl

Gentle Repose.name: Gentle Repose
Gentle Repose.desc: Target is protected from decay and can't become undead.

Gust of Wind.name: Gust of Wind
Gust of Wind.desc: 60' line, 10' wide blasts from you for duration.  Creatures starting turn in area are pushed 15' (Str save negates). Movement against wind uses x2 movement.  Disperses gasses, extinguishes fires. Bonus action: change direction of line.

Healing Spirit.name: Healing Spirit
Healing Spirit.desc: Conjure intangible spirit in 5ft cube. When you or creature you can see enters space for 1st time on turn or starts turn there, you can cause spirit to heal 1d6 to that creature (no action). Can't heal constructs or undead. Bonus action: move spirit up to 30ft within sight.  Overpower:  +1d6 healing/lvl

Heat Metal.name: Heat Metal
Heat Metal.desc: Creatures in physical contact with object take 2d8 fire dmg; you may use a bonus action to cause this damage again.  If the creature is holding the object, it must make a Con save or drop it.  If it doesn't drop the object, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and checks until the start of your next turn. Overpower: +d8 dmg

Hold Person.name: Hold Person
Hold Person.desc: Save or paralyzed.  Make another save at end of each turn.  Overpower: +1 target / lvl (targets within 30' of each other)

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.desc: Creature and possesions become invisible. Ends if target attacks or casts a spell.  Overpower:  +1 target / lvl

Knock.name: Knock
Knock.desc: Target becomes unlocked, unstuck, or onbarred.  Only 1 lock is affected.  Arcane locks suppressed for 10 min.  Loud knock sound audible within 300'.

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.desc: Cures 1 disease or condition (blind, deaf, paralyzed, poison)

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.desc: Target up to 500lbs rises vertically ≤20'. Unwilling creature allowed save to negate.  Change target's altitude by 20' on your turn (Action) or target can use Move/

Locate Animals or Plants.name: Locate Animals or Plants
Locate Animals or Plants.desc: You learn the direction and distance to the closest creature or plant of a specified kind w/in 5 miles, if any are present.

Locate Object.name: Locate Object
Locate Object.desc: Sense the direction to a familiar object's location w/in range.  Can't locate through any lead.

Magic Mouth.name: Magic Mouth
Magic Mouth.desc: Implant message on object (≤25 words), set visual/audio trigger. within 30' When triggered, mouth appears and speaks in your voice/volume.  Can dispel or reset itself.

Maximilian\u2019s Earthen Grasp.name: Maximilian’s Earthen Grasp
Maximilian\u2019s Earthen Grasp.desc: Hand reaches out from empty 5-foot square of earth. Grabs at adjacent creature (STR save or restrained and take 2d6 bludgeoning damage). On its turn can use Action to make STR check against spell save DC to break out. You can use Action to crush creature for 2d6 bludgeoning dmg (STR save for 1/2).  You can spend action to move hand in range to attack another (releases current).

Melf's Acid Arrow.name: Melf's Acid Arrow
Melf's Acid Arrow.desc: Ranged spell attack; hit deals 4d4 acid and 2d4 acid at end of its next turn.  On miss, splashes for 1/2 initial.  Overpower, +1d4 damage to initial and secondary / lvl

Mind Spike.name: Mind Spike
Mind Spike.desc: Target takes 3d8 psychic damage (WIS save for 1/2). On failed save, you know location of target until spell ends (same plane), and target cannot become invisible/hidden from you.  Overpower:  +1d8 dmg per spell slot above 2nd.

Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.desc: Create 3 duplicates of yourself (AC 10+dex). Attacks may hit those instead.  Images destroyed if hit.

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.desc: teleport up to 30' to unnocupied space

Moonbeam.name: Moonbeam
Moonbeam.desc: Cylinder provides dim light.  Creatures entering or starting turn in area take 2d10 radiant (Con save for 1/2).  Shapechanges revert to original form and have disadvantage on save.  Each turn, may use Action to move it 60'.  Overpower:  +1d10 / level

Nystul's Magic Aura.name: Nystul's Magic Aura
Nystul's Magic Aura.desc: Choose one or both: False Aura - create or hide magical aura, and change it to appear as school you choose.  Mask - change how target appears to spells/effects that detect creature types.  Spells/effects treat target as if it were that type/alignment

Pass Without Trace.name: Pass Without Trace
Pass Without Trace.desc: Each creature you choose gets +10 to stealth checks and can't be tracked by non-magical means.  Affected creatures don't leave tracks.

Phantasmal Force.name: Phantasmal Force
Phantasmal Force.desc:
Create phantasm in mind of target no larger than 10' cube. No effect on undead or constructs. Target can use action for Int (Investigation) against your spell DC to disbelieve.
Target treats phantasm as real, suffers 1d6 psychic damage if w/in 5' of damaging phantasm.

Prayer Of Healing.name: Prayer Of Healing
Prayer Of Healing.desc: Heals 2d8+spellcasting ability mod.  Overpower: +1d8 healing / lvl

Protection from Poison.name: Protection from Poison
Protection from Poison.desc: You neutralize one poison that you know is present, or neutralize one at random.  Target has advantage on saves vs poison, and resistance to poison dmg.

Pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
Pyrotechnics.desc: Extinguish nearby nonmagical fire (5ft cube). Choose 1 effect:  Fireworks: The fire explodes. Blinds all creatures within 10ft (CON save negates).  Smoke: spreads in 20ft radius (heavy obscurement) that lasts for 1 Min or until strong wind disperses.

Ray of Enfeeblement.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
Ray of Enfeeblement.desc: Ranged spell attack; on hit, creature deals 1/2 damage on STR weapon attacks.  Target saves at end of each turn to end (Con).

Rope Trick.name: Rope Trick
Rope Trick.desc: Rope enchanted to lead to extradimensional space, can hold up to 8 medium or smaller creatures. Rope can be pulled into space to disappear. Attacks can't cross in or out of the space. Those inside can see down. Everything falls down when spell ends.

Scorching Ray.name: Scorching Ray
Scorching Ray.desc: Fire 3 rays; ranged spell attack each; 2d6 fire damage.  Overpower: +1 ray / lvl

See Invisibility.name: See Invisibility
See Invisibility.desc: You see invisible things as if they were visible, and can see into the Ethereal Plane.  Ethereal creatures/objects appear ghostly.

Shadow Blade.name: Shadow Blade
Shadow Blade.desc: Create shadow blade in your hand (simple melee weapon, light, finesse, thrown 20/60, deals 2d8 psychic). When you attack target in dim light or darkness, you have advantage to hit. If drop weapon, it vanishes and can conjure it back with bonus action.  Overpower:  3-4th slot = 3d8, 5-6th slot = 4d8, 7+ slot = 5d8.

Shatter.name: Shatter
Shatter.desc: Deals 3d8 thunder dmg (Con save for 1/2). Creatures made of inorganic material (stone, crystal, metal) have disadv.  Damages non-attended nonmagical objects.  Overpower: +1d8 dmg / lvl

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.desc: no sound can be created in or through area for duration.

Skywrite.name: Skywrite
Skywrite.desc: Create up to 10 cloud words in sky

Snilloc\u2019s Snowball Swarm.name: Snilloc’s Snowball Swarm
Snilloc\u2019s Snowball Swarm.desc: Deals 3d6 in 5ft radius sphere.  DEX save for 1/2 damage.  Overpower: +1d6 dmg for each slot level above 2nd.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.desc: Climb speed equal to walking speed.  May move vertically and upside-down while hands are free.

Spike Growth.name: Spike Growth
Spike Growth.desc: Ground in area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures moving into/within area take 2d4 piercing damage per 5'.  Ground looks natural; Perception checks vs spell DC to detect

Spiritual Weapon.name: Spiritual Weapon
Spiritual Weapon.desc: Create a floating weapon.  Lasts duration; when cast, make melee spell attack vs creature w/in 5' of weapon.  On hit, target takes 1d8+spellcasting modifier force damage.  Bonus action: Move up to 20', make an attack. Overpower: +d8/2 lvl

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.desc: You suggest a non-harmful act.  On a failed save, target pursues the described act to the best of its ability for the duration.

Warding Bond.name: Warding Bond
Warding Bond.desc: While the target is w/in 60' of you it gains +1 AC and saves and resistance to all damage.  You take the same amount of damage it takes.

Warding Wind.name: Warding Wind
Warding Wind.desc: Strong wind surrounds you.  Deafens you and others, extinguishes small fires, difficult terrain to others, ranged weapons have disadvantage, blocks/disperses vapor, gas, fog.

Web.name: Web
Web.desc: You create webs that become difficult terrain and lightly obscure the area.  Spell ends after 1 round if the webs aren't anchored to two solid masses.  Restrains creatures that enter or start the turn in the area if they fail the save.

Zone of Truth.name: Zone of Truth
Zone of Truth.desc: Create a zone.  Creatures entering or starting their turn in the zone must make a Cha save or be unable to speak a deliberate lie.  You know whether the creature succeeds or fails the save.  It does not compel them to speak.

Animate Dead.name: Animate Dead
Animate Dead.desc: Create an undead servant (small or medium, skeleton or zombie). As a bonus action you may mentally command all creatures you made that are w/in 60' of you w/in 24 hours of creation.  You must recast the spell to retain control each day.  Reasserts control over ≤4 of your animated creatures. Overpower: +2 undead animated/reasserted / slot level.

Aura of Vitality.name: Aura of Vitality
Aura of Vitality.desc: You can use a bonus action to cause one creature w/in aura to regain 2d6 HP.  Aura moves with you.

Beacon Of Hope.name: Beacon Of Hope
Beacon Of Hope.desc: Targets have advantage on Wisdom & Death saves, receive maximum healing

Bestow Curse.name: Bestow Curse
Bestow Curse.desc: Choose one:  -Target has disadvantage on ability checks and saves with one ability score; -Target has disadvantage on attacks vs you; -Target must make a Wis save at start of turn, if it fails it wastes its action doing nothing; -Your attacks/spells deal +d8 necrotic damage to target. Overpower: +Duration: 4th lvl - Conc, 10 min; 5th - 8hrs; 7th 24hrs, 9th until dispelled. 5th or higher, no concentration required.

Blinding Smite.name: Blinding Smite
Blinding Smite.desc: On next melee hit, you deal an extra 3d8 radiant damage.  Target must succeed a Con save or be blinded until the spell ends.  Target makes another saving throw at the end of each of its turns to remove blindness.

Blink.name: Blink
Blink.desc: At end of your turn, roll d20. On 11+ you become ethereal. At start of next turn, you return to empty space within 10ft of where you vanished. Can dismiss spell as Action.  While Etheral, you can see 60ft in shades of grey into prime material. Can ony affect/be affected by Ethereal creatures.

Call Lightning.name: Call Lightning
Call Lightning.desc: Storm cloud appears 100' above you. Fails if insufficient room. Point to spot within range. Creatures within 5' or point take 3d10 lightning damage (Save for 1/2). Use Action each turn to call lightning again.  In stormy weather, +1d10 damage.  Overpower:  +1d10 dmg/ slot lvl above 3rd

Catnap.name: Catnap
Catnap.desc: Willing targets fall unconscious for duration. Ends early if target takes damage or is awakened (action).  If target sleeps full duration, gainst benefit of short rest. Can't benefit again until long rest.  Overpower: +1 target per spell slot above 3rd.

Clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
Clairvoyance.desc: You create an invisible sensor w/in range.  You hear or see at a location familiar to you at the sensor location.  As an action you can switch between hearing or seeing.

Conjure Animals.name: Conjure Animals
Conjure Animals.desc: Conjure fey beasts into empty spaces. 1 beasts of CR ≤2, 2 beasts of CR ≤1, 4 beasts of CR ≤1/2, or 8 beasts of CR ≤1/4. Beasts are friendly to you + allies, act on own group initiative, obey verbal commands, defend themselves.  Overpower:  x2 numbers with 5th lvl slot, x3 with 7th lvl slot, and x4 with 9th lvl slot.

Conjure Barrage.name: Conjure Barrage
Conjure Barrage.desc: Throw a non-magical weapon or ammunition, forms cone of indentical weapons. 3d8 damage, half on save. Same damage type as original weapon.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.desc: Counter spell of 3rd or lower.  4th or higher requires ability check (primary casting stat) DC 10+spell level. Overpower: raise level of counterspell

Create Food and Water.name: Create Food and Water
Create Food and Water.desc: You create 45 lbs of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers w/in range.

Crusader's Mantle.name: Crusader's Mantle
Crusader's Mantle.desc: nonhostile creatures in aura deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage with weapon attacks.  Aura moves with you.

Daylight.name: Daylight
Daylight.desc: You create a sphere of bright light.  Can be cast on an object.  Dispels the Darkness spell.

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.desc: Auto ends spells of  level 1-3. Higher level spells (4+) require spellcasting ability check DC 10+spell lvl.  Overpower: raises spell level of Dispel

Elemental Weapon.name: Elemental Weapon
Elemental Weapon.desc: Weapon gains +1 bonus to attack and deals an extra 1d4 damage of a chosen elemental type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder). Overpower: If you use a 5th/6th level spell slot, +2 to attack, +2d4 elemental dmg

Enemies Abound.name: Enemies Abound
Enemies Abound.desc: Creature makes INT save; Immune to Fear = success.  On failed save, target sees all creatures as enemy. Each time takes damage, repeat save to end. Must choose enemy targets at random. Makes all Opportunity attacks available to it.

Erupting Earth.name: Erupting Earth
Erupting Earth.desc: Cube centered on point becomes difficult terrain. Each 5ft portion takes 1 minute to clear by hand.  Creatures in cube take 3d12 bludgeoning damage (DEX save for 1/2).  Overpower:  +1d12 dmge/lvl above 3rd

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.desc: Creatures becomes frightened and drop whatever it is holding.  They Dash away; if it ends its turn and you are not visible, they make a Wis save to end the effect.

Feign Death.name: Feign Death
Feign Death.desc: Target appears dead to all outward inspection and spells, and is blind and incapacitated, has resist to all but psychic dmg, and disease/poison are suppressed.  Dismiss via touch.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.desc: Creatures take 8d6 fire damage, save for 1/2. Ignites combustibles.  Overpower: +1d6 / lvl

Flame Arrows.name: Flame Arrows
Flame Arrows.desc: When target is hit with enchanted ammo, takes +1d6 fire damage.  Enchantment works for 1 use per ammo.  Overpower: +2 ammo/lvl above 3rd.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.desc: Fly speed of 60'.  Overpower: +1 creature / lvl

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.desc: Willing creature gains fly:10', can occupy space of other creature. Resistance to nonmagical damage,

Glyph of Warding.name: Glyph of Warding
Glyph of Warding.desc: You create a glyph and choose a triggering action.  Choose one: Explosive: 20' rad 5d8 elemental dmg of your choise; Spell: Store a prepared spell of 3rd or lower, it goes off when triggered. Overpower +1d8 dmg or +1 spell lvl

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.desc: x2 Speed, +2 AC, advantage on Dex saves, +1 action per turn (Attack, Dash, Disengage, Hide, Use Object).  After duration, target can't move or take actions for 1 turn.

Hunger of Hadar.name: Hunger of Hadar
Hunger of Hadar.desc: A 20-foot-radius void appears. It's filled with whispers and slurping that can be heard up to 30 feet away. No light can illuminate the area, and creatures fully in it are blinded. The void's area is difficult terrain. Creature staring turn in zone take 2d6 cold damage. Ending turn takes 2d6 acid damage (DEX save negates).

Hypnotic Pattern.name: Hypnotic Pattern
Hypnotic Pattern.desc: Each creature in area is charmed.  The spell ends if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor

Leomund's Tiny Hut.name: Leomund's Tiny Hut
Leomund's Tiny Hut.desc: 9 creatures of medium size or smaller fit inside.  All other creatures and objects are barred from entering. Spells and magic effects are barred from passing through.  You control the interior lighting, and the dome is opaque from the outside, transparent from inside.

Life Transference.name: Life Transference
Life Transference.desc: You take 4d8 necrotic damage and 1 creature you can see in range gains hp equal to damage you took x2.  Overpower:  +1d8 damage per slot level above 3rd.

Lightning Arrow.name: Lightning Arrow
Lightning Arrow.desc: Next ranged weapon attack you make transforms projectile into lightning bolt (4d8 damage on hit, 1/2 on miss).  This replaces the normal attack.  Hit or miss, creatures within 10ft of target take 2d8 lightning damage (DEX save for 1/2).  The weapon or ammo returns to normal after.  Overpower: +1d8 damage to both effects for each slot level above 3rd.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.desc: Deals 8d6 lightning damage, save for 1/2.  Ignites combustibles.  Overpowered: +1d6 damage / lvl

Magic Circle.name: Magic Circle
Magic Circle.desc: Affects one or more of these types: celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, undead.  Hedges them out, creatures have disadvantage on attacks vs targets w'in cylinder, target w/in cylinder can't be charmed, frightened, or possessed.  When cast, you can choose to make it operate in reverse, trapping creature w/in it.  Overpower: +1 Hr duration

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.desc: Image includes sounds, smells, temp.  Use Action to move image in range. Observers can spend Action to make Investigation check. Overpower: 6th+ no concentration required.

Mass Healing Word.name: Mass Healing Word
Mass Healing Word.desc: Creatures heal 1d4+ spellcasting ability modifier. Overpower: +1d4 healing / lvl

Meld into Stone.name: Meld into Stone
Meld into Stone.desc: You merge into the stone; you are unable to see outside, but may make Perception checks to hear.  The spell ends when you leave the stone.  Partial destruction of stone expels you and deals 6d6 bludgeoning, and you fall prone.
Meld into Stone.casting_targets: stone surface large enough to contain you

Melf\u2019s Minute Meteors.name: Melf’s Minute Meteors
Melf\u2019s Minute Meteors.desc: Six tiny meteors orbit you. As bonus action on subsequent turns, you can hurl 1-2 meteors points in range. Explodes at point or if hits solid surface, dealing 2d6 fire damage in 5ft radius explosion (DEX save for 1/2).  Overpower: +2 meteors for each slot level above 3rd.

Nondetection.name: Nondetection
Nondetection.desc: Hide willing target/object (10' cube) from divination magic or magical scrying sensors.

Phantom Steed.name: Phantom Steed
Phantom Steed.desc: Steed of your appearance appears (with saddle, etc). Creature you choose can ride.  Riding horse stats except speed of 100',  10 mph. When spell ends, steed gradually fades (1min). Spell ends when dismissed or steed takes damage.

Plant Growth.name: Plant Growth
Plant Growth.desc: 2 versions:  1 Action - 100' radius - with exclusion areas you secify, plants grow thick (1/4 movement). 8 Hours - plants in 1/2 mile rad yield x2 harvest for 1 year.

Protection From Energy.name: Protection From Energy
Protection From Energy.desc: Creature gains resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

Remove Curse.name: Remove Curse
Remove Curse.desc: All curses are removed. Breaks attunement to cursed items.

Revivify.name: Revivify
Revivify.desc: Return creature to life with 1 hp that died within last minute.

Sending.name: Sending
Sending.desc: You send a short ≤25 word message to a familiar creature.  Target can make equaly short reply.

Sleet Storm.name: Sleet Storm
Sleet Storm.desc: Freezing rain/sleet falls in 20' tall, 40' radius cylinder n range.  Heavily obscured, extinguishes flames, covers ground in slick ice (difficult terrain).  When creature enters for first time on turn or starts turn there, save or fall prone.  Concentration vs spell DC required to maintain spells in area.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.desc: Targets in 40ft cube are slowed (WIS save negates).  Slow = 1/2 speed, -2 AC and DEX saves, cannot use reactions, can only take bonus or Action (not both), and cannot make >1 attack in a turn.  If casting spell with time of 1 Action, 50% chance the spell takes effect on creatures next turn and it must spend Action again, or spell is wasted.  Slowed creatures can make WIS save and end of turn to end effect.

Speak With Dead.name: Speak With Dead
Speak With Dead.desc: Ask a corpse 5 questions, it only knows what it knew in life; it does not have to tell the truth.

Speak with Plants.name: Speak with Plants
Speak with Plants.desc: You can question plants in area of effect about events in AoE within past day. Can also turn difficult terrain into regular and vice versa for duration.  Plants might perform other tasks (DM).  If plant creature in area, can talk to it (only).  Can cause Entangle to release specific creatures.

Spirit Guardians.name: Spirit Guardians
Spirit Guardians.desc: Designate unaffected targets.  Affected creatures' speed halved in area, must make save or take 3d8 radiant if entering or starting its turn in area.

Stinking Cloud.name: Stinking Cloud
Stinking Cloud.desc: Cloud is heavily obscured, flows around corners.  Creatures in cloud at start of turn must save against poison.  On fail, spends action retching.  non-breathing creatures are immune.

Summon Lesser Demons.name: Summon Lesser Demons
Summon Lesser Demons.desc: Summon Random Demons (1d8):  1-2 = two demons CR ≤1; 3-4 = Four demons CR ≤1/2; 5-6 = Eight demons CR ≤1/4.  Demon chooses demons, hostile to all creatures, own initiative, attack nearest non-demon. Can form circle with blood as part of casting, which demons cannot enter or target within.  Overpower: 6-7th slot, x2 demons.  8-9th slot, x3 demons.

Thunderstep.name: Thunderstep
Thunderstep.desc: Teleport yourself, each creature within 10ft of space you left takes 3d10 thunder dmg (CON save 1/2). Heard 300ft away. Can bring objects (limited by carry weight) or creature your size or smaller (adjacent).  Overpower: +1d10 dmg per slot level above 3rd.

Tidal Wave.name: Tidal Wave
Tidal Wave.desc: Wave up to 30'x10' x 10' high crashes down on an area.  Creatures take 4d8 bludgeoning and are knocked prone (Dex save 1/2 dmg and no prone).  Water spreads an extra 30ft in all directions, extinguishing unprotected flames, then vanishes.

Tiny Servant.name: Tiny Servant
Tiny Servant.desc: Object animates under your control. Bonus action: mentally command creature within 120ft. You decide what action/move creature takes on its next turn. If no command, it defends itself. Follows order until complete. Overpower: +2 objects per slot above 3rd.

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.desc: Grants the target the ability to understand any spoken language, and the target is understood by any creature that knows at least one language.

Vampiric Touch.name: Vampiric Touch
Vampiric Touch.desc: For duration, make melee spell attack; hit deals 3d6 necrotic damage and heals you for 1/2 necrotic dealt.  Overpower:  +1d6 damage per level

Wall of Sand.name: Wall of Sand
Wall of Sand.desc: Create wall of sand on ground at point you can see.  Up to 30ft long, 10ft high, 10ft thick. Vanishes when spell ends. Blocks line of sight. Movement through it costs 3ft per foot moved.  Creatures blinded while within wall.

Wall of Water.name: Wall of Water
Wall of Water.desc: Wall up to 30' long, 10' high, 1' thick on ground in range.  Wall vanishes when spell ends.  Wall's space is difficult terrain.  Ranged attacks passing through space have disadvantage; fire dmg halved.  Cold dmg causes area it passes through to freeze.  Each 5'x5' section has AC 5 and 15 hp. Destroyed sections aren't replaced.

Water Breathing.name: Water Breathing
Water Breathing.desc: Targets can breathe underwater in addition to normal breathing methods.

Water Walk.name: Water Walk
Water Walk.desc: Targets can move across any liquid surface.  Submerged targets are brought to the surface at a rate of 60'/rnd

Wind Wall.name: Wind Wall
Wind Wall.desc: Wall of wind up to 50' long, 15' high, 1' thick, shaped any way you choose in continuous path along ground.  Creatures in area take 3d8 bludgeoning dmg (STR save for 1/2).  Wind keeps gasses at bay. Small flyers or gaseous can't pass through wall.  Projectiles passing through wall automatically miss.

Arcane Eye.name: Arcane Eye
Arcane Eye.desc: Create invisible eye that sees in all directions (normal and 30' darkvision).

Aura of Life.name: Aura of Life
Aura of Life.desc: Nonhostile creatures in aura have necrotic resistance; hit points maximums can't be reduced; regains 1 hit point if at 0 hp when turn starts in the aura.

Aura of Purity.name: Aura of Purity
Aura of Purity.desc: Nonhostile creatures in aura can't become diseased, resist poison, and advantage vs saves that cause blind, charm, deaf, fright, paralysis, poison, or stun.

Banishment.name: Banishment
Banishment.desc: Banish the target; if target is native, banished until spell ends.  If target is not native and spell lasts a full minute, target does not return.  Overpower: +1 target / slot level

Blight.name: Blight
Blight.desc: 8d8 Necrotic damage (save for 1/2).  no effect on undead/constructs.  Plant creature or magical plant save with disadvantage and take max damage. Normal plants die. Overpower: extra d8 / slot level >4th.

Charm Monster.name: Charm Monster
Charm Monster.desc: Target must make WIS save (advantage if fighting you).  If it fails, it's charmed by you until spell ends or its harmed by you or your allies.  Charmed creature is friendly to you and knows it was charmed after.  Overpower:  +1 creature per slot above 4th level (30ft of each other).

Compulsion.name: Compulsion
Compulsion.desc: Targets that you can see within range and that can hear you that fail the save are compelled to move it's max movement. Charm immunity = save success. Use a bonus action on each of your turns to designate a direction horizontal to you.  They may use their action before or after this movement.  After moving, it can make another Wis save to try to end the effect.  They are not compelled to move into hazards, but will provoke opportunity attacks to move.

Confusion.name: Confusion
Confusion.desc: Affected target can't take reactions and must roll a d10 at the start of each of its turns:  1: Uses all its movement in a random direction determined by a d8. 2-6: Does nothing. 7-8: Random melee attack vs creature in reach or does nothing. 9-10: Acts normally.  It makes a new save to end the affect at the end of turn. Overpower: +5' radius / slot lvl > 4th

Conjure Minor Elementals.name: Conjure Minor Elementals
Conjure Minor Elementals.desc: Choose: One CR2, Two CR 1, Four CR 1/2, or Eight CR 1/4 Elementals.  Summons are friendly to you and allies.  Roll Init for group. Obey verbal commands you issue.

Conjure Woodland Beings.name: Conjure Woodland Beings
Conjure Woodland Beings.desc: Summon fey into empty spaces. Choose One: 1 Fey CR 2 or lower, 2 Fey CR 1  or lower, 4 Fey CR 1/2 or lower, or 8 Fey CR 1/4 or lower. Summons are friendly to you and allies, obey verbal commands (no action), and otherwise defend themselves.  Overpower:  x2 creatures at 6th level slot, x3 at 8th level slot

Control Water.name: Control Water
Control Water.desc: Choose an effect:  Flood, Part, Redirect, Whirlpool.  As an action you may choose a new effect each round.

Death Ward.name: Death Ward
Death Ward.desc: Next time target drops to 0, instead has 1 hp. Negates next death effect.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.desc: Teleport within range, line of effect not needed

Divination.name: Divination
Divination.desc: Ask single question about a goal, event, or activity within 7 days.

Dominate Beast.name: Dominate Beast
Dominate Beast.desc: Target creature is charmed by you (WIS save negates).  Hostlie creatures have advantage on save. You have telepathic link with creature and give commands (no action), otherwise it defends itself. Use your action/reaction to control its action/reaction.  Target can make new save each time it takes damage.  Overpower:  Increase duration - 5th (10min), 6th (1 Hr), 7th (8 Hr).

Elemental Bane.name: Elemental Bane
Elemental Bane.desc: Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.  Target creature must make CON save. If it fails, it loses resistance of that type and the first time it takes that type of damage on a turn, it takes an extra 2d6 damage of that type.  Overpower:  +1 target per spell slot level above 4th. Must be within 30ft of each other.

Evard's Black Tentacles.name: Evard's Black Tentacles
Evard's Black Tentacles.desc: Area is difficult terrain. When creature enters or starts turn in area, Dex save or take 3d6 bludgeoning and be restrained for duration.  Restrained creatures take 3d6 bludgeoning at start of turn.  Str or Dex check vs save (action) DC to free itself.

Fabricate.name: Fabricate
Fabricate.desc: Convert raw mats into finished products. Fabricate Lare or smaller (10' cube or eight 5' cubes) if have enough mats.  Metal/stone/mineral objects must me medium or in 5' cube or smaller. Can't create creatures/magic items or craftsmanship objects without appropriate tool proficiency.

Find Greater Steed.name: Find Greater Steed
Find Greater Steed.desc: Spirit takes form you choose (grffon, pegasus, peryton, dire wolf, rhino, or sabertoothed tiger). Celestial or fey version of type (See MM). INT becomes 6 minimum, can understand 1 language you speak. You control mount in combat, can speak telepathically to it within 1 mile, Spells targeting you can target mount (if mounted). Dismiss as Action. Casting again summons same mount..

Fire Shield.name: Fire Shield
Fire Shield.desc: light in 10'/20'; resistance to cold or fire; when hit by melee attack, creature takes 2d8 cold or fire damage

Freedom Of Movement.name: Freedom Of Movement
Freedom Of Movement.desc: Movement unaffected by difficult terrain and magic that reduces speed, paralyzes, or restrains. Can spend 5' of movement to escape from nonmagical constraints. Functions normally underwater.

Giant Insect.name: Giant Insect
Giant Insect.desc: Transform up to 10 centipedes, 3 spiders, 5 wasps, or 1 scorpion into giant versions that obey your verbal commands (act on your turn). DM resolves stats, actions, and movement.  When spell ends or creature drops to 0, it reverts to normal.

Grasping Vine.name: Grasping Vine
Grasping Vine.desc: Conjure vine into empty space and direct it to attack creature within 30ft of it that you see. Creature is pulled 20ft towards vine (DEX save negates). Until spell ends, you can use bonus action to attack same or another creature.

Greater Invisibility.name: Greater Invisibility
Greater Invisibility.desc: Become invisible until spell duration ends

Guardian Of Faith.name: Guardian Of Faith
Guardian Of Faith.desc: Guardian occupies space and enemies that move within 10' of guardian take 20 radiant damage (save for 1/2).  Damages when it has dealt 60 total damage.

Guardian of Nature.name: Guardian of Nature
Guardian of Nature.desc: You Transform into Primal Beast or Great Tree.  Beast: +10ft walk speed, darkvision 120ft, STR attacks with advantage, +1d6 force damage on melee attacks.  Great Tree: +10 temp hp, CON saves with advantage, DEX & Wis attacks with advantage, while on ground 15ft radius difficult terrain to enemies.

Hallucinatory Terrain.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
Hallucinatory Terrain.desc: You make natural terrain in range look, sound, and smell like some other sort of natural terrain.  Tactile characteristics are unchanged.  If the difference isn't obvious by touch, a creature can attempt an Investigation check against your spell DC to disbelieve.

Ice Storm.name: Ice Storm
Ice Storm.desc: Deals 2d8 bludgeoning and 4d6 cold damage, save for 1/2.  Are becomes difficult terrain. Overpower: +1d8 bludgeoning damage / lvl

Leomud's Secret Chest.name: Leomud's Secret Chest
Leomud's Secret Chest.desc: Hide chest (up to 12cu') on ethereal plane.  Can touch replica to call/send chest. After 60 days, spell may end (see PHB).

Locate Creature.name: Locate Creature
Locate Creature.desc: Sense the direction to a familiar creature's location w/in range.  Can't locate through 10' of running water in path.

Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound.name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound.desc: Conjure stationary invisible dog you can see. Barks at creatures within 30' that dont speak password. Sees invisible/ethereal and ignores illusions. Start of your turn, dog bites hostile creatures using your spell attack (4d8 piercing).

Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum.name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum
Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum.desc: Ward area with various securities:  prevent sound, vision, sensors, divination, teleportation and planar travel.  Overpower:  +100' size / lvl

Otiluke's Resilient Sphere.name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
Otiluke's Resilient Sphere.desc: Sphere of force encloses target.  Dex save negates. Nothing can pass through barrier, though target can breather. Sphere is immune to damage and weightless. Enclosed creature can use action to push sphere and roll it 1/2 speed. Globe can be picked up/moved by creatures. Disintegrate spell destroys sphere without harming enclosed.
Otiluke's Resilient Sphere.casting_targets: 1 creature or object L or smaller

Phantasmal Killer.name: Phantasmal Killer
Phantasmal Killer.desc: Creature makes Wisdom save or be frightened.  At end of each turn, target must make Wisdom save or take 4d10 psychic damage.  On successful save, spell ends.

Polymorph.name: Polymorph
Polymorph.desc: Polymorphs 1 creature into a beast with CR ≤ target's level or CR.  Wisdom save negates. Shapechanges auto succeed. Lasts for duration or until target drops to 0 hp or dies. Assumes all stats of new for except alignment and personality.

Shadow of Moil.name: Shadow of Moil
Shadow of Moil.desc: Flame-like shadows surround you (heavily obscured). Shadows turn dim light within 10ft of you dark, bright light becomes dim. You have resistance to Radiant, when creature within 10ft of you hits you with attack, shadows lash it for 2d8 necrotic

Sickening Radiance.name: Sickening Radiance
Sickening Radiance.desc: Sphere lit by dim green light. Creatures moving into area for first time on turn or starting turn there take 4d10 radiant dmg and suffer 1 level of exhaustion (CON save negates).  Invisibility impossible. Light and exhaustion go away when spell ends.

Staggering Smite.name: Staggering Smite
Staggering Smite.desc: On next melee hit, you deal an extra 4d6 psychic damage.  On a failed Wis save, it has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and can't take reactions until the end of its next turn.

Stone Shape.name: Stone Shape
Stone Shape.desc: Medium or smaller stone object or 5' section of stone reshapes to suit your purposes.

Stoneskin.name: Stoneskin
Stoneskin.desc: Target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeon, pierce, slashing damage

Storm Sphere.name: Storm Sphere
Storm Sphere.desc: Each creature in sphere when it appears or who ends turn in sphere makes STR save or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage.  Sphere space is difficult terrain.  Bonus action on your turn to cause bolt of lightning to leap from center (ranged spell attack at 60' range) for 4d6 lightning damage. You have advantage on attack if target is in sphere. Creatures within 30' of sphere have disadvantage on perception checks to listen.  Overpower: +1d6 to all dmg/lvl

Summon Greater Demon.name: Summon Greater Demon
Summon Greater Demon.desc: Summon demon CR ≤5 of your choice. Own initiative and turns. You can issue commands (no action), else it defends itself. At end of each of demon's turn, makes CHA save (disadvantage if you use its Truename). On success, your control breaks and demon stays for duration, attacking nearest non-demons. Uncontrolled demon stays for 1d6 rounds. If make blood circle as part of casting, demon can't cross/target inside circle.  Overpower:  +1 CR per slot above 4th.

Vitriolic Sphere.name: Vitriolic Sphere
Vitriolic Sphere.desc: Each creature in sphere takes 10d4 acid damage now and 5d4 acid at the end of its next turn.  DEX save for 1/2 initial damage and no additional.  Overpower:  +2d4 initial damage per slot level above 4th.

Wall of Fire.name: Wall of Fire
Wall of Fire.desc: Creatures in area take 5d8 fire damage (1/2 with save).  One side deals damage within 10' - other is safe. Creatures take damage when they end turn or enter area. Overpower: +1d8 damage/lvl

Watery Sphere.name: Watery Sphere
Watery Sphere.desc: 5-foot rad. sphere of water appears, can hover 10ft.  Creature in space must make STR save. Success = pushed nearest free space of target’s choice.  Fail = restrained. Save at end of each turn. Huge+ creatures auto save. Large or smaller can choose to fail. Sphere can restrain 4 Med or 1 Large. Exceed capacity releases random (prone). As Action, move sphere 30ft in straight line. Drops to hover 10ft. Restrained creatures move with it. Can move sphere into creatures, forcing saves.  When ends, sphere collapses, extinguishing normal flames within 30ft. Restrained creatures fall prone. Water vanishes.

Animate Objects.name: Animate Objects
Animate Objects.desc: Objects come to life at your command.  Medium targets count as two objects, Large as four, Huge as eight.  Each target animates and becomes a creature under your command.  Command creatures as bonus actioni. See PHB pg 213 for animated object stats. Overpower: +2 objects animated / slot level.

Antilife Shell.name: Antilife Shell
Antilife Shell.desc: 10' rad sphere centered on prevents creatures other than undead & constructs from entering. Blocked creatures can cast spells or make attacks with ranged/reach weapons into sphere. If you force sphere onto blocked creatures, the spell ends.

Awaken.name: Awaken
Awaken.desc: Target gains Int of 10, speaks one language you know.  Plants gain the ability to move.  It is charmed by your for 30 days or until you harm it.
Awaken.casting_targets: 1 Huge or smaller beast or plant

Banishing Smite.name: Banishing Smite
Banishing Smite.desc: On next hit, you deal an extra 5d10 force damage.  If the attack reduces the target to 50 HP or less, you banish it as per the Banishment spell.

Bigby's Hand.name: Bigby's Hand
Bigby's Hand.desc: Create Large hand. AC 20, hp=your max, ends at 0hp, Str 26, Dex 10. Doesn’t fill space. Bonus action: hand moves 60ft and causes 1 effect:  Clenched Fist, Forceful Hand, Grasping Hand, or Interposing Hand. See PHB for details.

Circle of Power.name: Circle of Power
Circle of Power.desc: Friendly creatures in area have advantage and evasion on saves vs spells and magic effects.  Aura moves with you. Saves allowing half dmg, result in no dmg.

Cloudkill.name: Cloudkill
Cloudkill.desc: When creature enters or starts turn, 5d8 poison (save for 1/2).  Fog moves 10' away from you each turn. Add'l 1d8 per slot level > 5th

Commune.name: Commune
Commune.desc: Ask and receive answers to 3 "Yes/no" questions. Answer may be "unclear". DM discretion on questions contradictory to deity's interests.  Casting 2+ times before long rest, has 25% cum failure chance.

Commune with Nature.name: Commune with Nature
Commune with Nature.desc: Outdoors, gain knowledge of land within 3 miles (300ft underground). Spell fails in constructed areas (dungeons, cities). You learn 3 facts of your choice:  terrain or bodies of water; prevalent plants, minerals, animals, or peoples; powreful celestials, fey, fiends, elementals, or undead; influence from other planes of existence; or buildings

Cone Of Cold.name: Cone Of Cold
Cone Of Cold.desc: Deals 8d8 cold damage, save for 1/2 damage.  Overpower: +1d8 /  slot lvl > 5th

Conjure Elemental.name: Conjure Elemental
Conjure Elemental.desc: Choose air, earth, fire, or water that fills 10ft cube. Elemental CR ≤5 of appropriate element emerges from it. Friendly to you and allies. Obeys verbal commands you give it (no action), or defends itself. Lose control on lost concentration, and it becomes hostile towards you. Overpower: +1 CR / slot lvl > 5th.

Conjure Volley.name: Conjure Volley
Conjure Volley.desc: Throw/fire nonmagical weapon or ammo into air and choose point in range.  Each creature in 40ft radius, 30ft high cylinder takes 8d8 damage of weapon type (DEX save for 1/2).

Contact Other Plane.name: Contact Other Plane
Contact Other Plane.desc:
Contact other planar entity. DC 15 Int save to stay sane. On fail, 6d6 pysch dam., and insane until long rest.
On save, ask 5 questions. Entity answers “yes,” “no,” “maybe,” “never,” “irrelevant,” or “unclear”, or short phrase if confusing.

Contagion.name: Contagion
Contagion.desc: Make a melee spell attack.  On hit, you afflict the target with a disease.  At the end of target's turns, it makes a Con save; if it fails three the disease's effects last the duration; if it succeeds three, it recovers and the spell ends.  (Blinding Sickness, Filth Fever, Flesh Rot, Mindfire, Seizure, Slimy Doom)

Control Winds.name: Control Winds
Control Winds.desc: Choose 1 effect in area: Gusts (calm, mod, strong) moderate+ impose disadv to ranged weapon attacks, movement is difficult.  Downdraft = ranged weap. attacks have disadv. Flyers entering/starting knocked prone (STR save neg.)  Updraft = half falling dmg, +10ft vertical jump

Creation.name: Creation
Creation.desc: Create nonliving object of matter in 5ft cube. Duration depends on material (vegetable = 1 Day, Adamantine or mithral = 1 Min).  See PHB.  Overpower: +5ft to cube dimensions for each slot level above 5th.

Danse Macabre.name: Danse Macabre
Danse Macabre.desc: Create zombies or skeletons from corpses. They gain bonus to attack/damage = your spellcasting modifier. Bonus action to command created within 60ft. You decide action/move of created on their next turn, else they defend themselves. Overpower: +2 corpses per slot over 5th.

Dawn.name: Dawn
Dawn.desc: Sunlight shines in cylinder. Creatures in cylinder when cast or ending turn there take 4d10 radiant (CON save for 1/2). Bonus Action: move cylinder up to 60ft.

Destructive Wave.name: Destructive Wave
Destructive Wave.desc: Each creature you choose w/in range must succeed on a Con save or take 5d6 thunder damage and 5d6 radiant or necrotic damage and be knocked prone.  If it succeeds, it takes half damage and is not knocked prone.

Dispel Evil and Good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
Dispel Evil and Good.desc:
Celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead have disadvantage on attacks vs you.  End the spell early by using either of these:
Break Enchant: Removes charmed, frightened, possessed from a target. Dismiss: Cha save or creature is banished to home plane.

Dominate Person.name: Dominate Person
Dominate Person.desc: Creature becomes dominated and you control it with your Action.  Has advantage on save if you are fighting it.  Any damage grants another save.  Overpower: 6th = 10 min, 7th = 1 Hr, 8th+ = 8 Hrs

Dream.name: Dream
Dream.desc: Send dreams to target.  Nightmares deal 3d6 psychic damage on failed save and do not rest. If you have part of the creature, disadvantage on save.

Enervation.name: Enervation
Enervation.desc: Drain life from target for 4d8 necrotic (save for 1/2 and end spell).  On failure, spell continues:  spend Action to automatically deal 4d8 necrotic damage to target. Spell ends if you use your action to do anything else, if target leaves spell range, or target has total cover. You regain hp equal to 1/2 damage target takes from spell.  Overpower:  +1d8 damage per slot above 5th.

Far Step.name: Far Step
Far Step.desc: Teleport up to 60' to space you can see. Teleport again on each of your turns as bonus action.

Flame Strike.name: Flame Strike
Flame Strike.desc: Creatures take 4d6 fire and 4d6 radiant damage, save for 1/2.  Overpower: +1d6 fire or radiant / lvl

Geas.name: Geas
Geas.desc: Target becomes charmed; takes 5d10 psychic damage each time it acts in a manner countering your instructions, but only 1/day.  You can issue any nonsuicidal command.  Overpower: +1 yer duration

Greater Restoration.name: Greater Restoration
Greater Restoration.desc: Reduce exhaustion level by one, or end one of following: charm, petrify, curse, ability score or hp max reduction

Hallow.name: Hallow
Hallow.desc: Area acts as Magic Circle.  Choose an extra effect: Courage: creatures can't be frightened, Darkness: Darkness fills the area, Daylight: Bright light fills the area, Energy Prot: Resistance to one damage type, Energy Vuln: Vulnerability to one damage type, Everlasting Rest: Dead bodies immune to undead, Extradim Interference: Teleport stuff doesn't work, Fear: Creatures frightened in area, Silence: Silenced, Tongues: Creatures can communicate regardless of language.

Hold Monster.name: Hold Monster
Hold Monster.desc: Target is paralyzed.  At the end of each of its turns, it makes a Wis save to end the effect. Overpower: +1 target w/in 30' of other targets

Holy Weapon.name: Holy Weapon
Holy Weapon.desc: Weapon emits bright light (30ft), deals +2d8 radiant on hit, becomes magic.  Bonus action: dismiss spell and cause weapon to burst. Creatures within 30ft make CON save, taking 4d8 radiant and blind on fail, 1/2 on success. Blind creatures save at end of each turn to end blind.

Immolation.name: Immolation
Immolation.desc: Creature takes 8d6 fire damage (DEX save for 1/2). On fail, wreathed in fire, bright light (30ft rad). Immolated take 4d6 fire at end of its turn (DEX save negates and ends effect).  Flames can't be extinguised non-magically.

Infernal Calling.name: Infernal Calling
Infernal Calling.desc: Summon devil CR ≤6 of your choice. Roll init for devil (unfriendly to you and may attack or bargain). On your turns, you can try to make Deception, Intimidate, or Persuasion check vs devil's Insight (Advantage if you use Truename) to make devil follow your commands. If it succeeds, immune. If conc. ends early, devil stays if immune to commands for 3d6 min. If possess devil talisman, can summon +1 CR with no CHA checks. Overpower: +1 CR per spell slot above 6th.

Insect Plague.name: Insect Plague
Insect Plague.desc: Each creature in area makes save or takes 4d10 piercing dmg, half on save.  Creatures entering or ending a turn make this save. Overpower: +1d10 dmg

Legend Lore.name: Legend Lore
Legend Lore.desc: You learn significant lore about a person, place, or object.

Maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
Maelstrom.desc: 5ft deep, 30ft radius water swirls on point you see on ground or in water. Area is difficult terrain. Starting turn in zone must make STR save or take 6d6 bludgeoning damage and pulled 10ft towards center

Mass Cure Wounds.name: Mass Cure Wounds
Mass Cure Wounds.desc: Heals 3d8+spellcasting ability mod hp. No effect on undead or constructs.  Overpower: +1d8 healing / lvl

Mislead.name: Mislead
Mislead.desc: Become invisible & illusory clone of you appears where you stand. Double lasts for duration, invisibilty lasts until you attack/cast spell. Use your action to move clone 2x your speed and control behavior. You can use bonus action to gain its senses instead of your own, or switch back.

Modify Memory.name: Modify Memory
Modify Memory.desc: Modify creature's memory on failed WIS save (advantage if its in combat).  Modify memory up to 10 minutes within last 24 hrs. While being modified, it's incapacitated, charmed, and unaware of surrounding. You can erase all memory of event, allow perfect recall, change details, or create new event. Language dependent. Remove Curse/Greater Restoration restores true memory.  Overpower: 6th = 7 days ago, 7th = 30 days ago, 8th = 1 year ago, 9th = any time ago

Negative Energy Flood.name: Negative Energy Flood
Negative Energy Flood.desc: Unless undead, target taked 5d12 necrotic damage (CON save for 1/2).  Target killed by spell rises as zombie at start of your next turn. If target is undead, instead gains 1/2 of 5d12 temp hp.

Passwall.name: Passwall
Passwall.desc: Creates passage on wooden, plaser, or stone surface.

Planar Binding.name: Planar Binding
Planar Binding.desc: You attempt to bind a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to your service.  The creature must stay in range for entire casting time.  Target makes a save; on failure it is bound to serve you. Overpower: +Duration

Raise Dead.name: Raise Dead
Raise Dead.desc: Bring creature back to life (dead ≤10 days) with 1 hp

Rary's Telepathic Bond.name: Rary's Telepathic Bond
Rary's Telepathic Bond.desc: Create telepathic link among targets (minimum INT of 3). Targets can communicate telepathically regardless of common language and over any distance on same plane.

Reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
Reincarnate.desc: Touch dead humanoid or piece of one that died in last 10 days. If it's willing to come back, Spell makes new adult body randomly determined DM or d100 roll.  See PHB for table. Creature remembers old life and retains capabilities except racial traits.

Scrying.name: Scrying
Scrying.desc: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose.  Target makes a Wis save mod'd by how well you know them.  On a failed save, you can see/hear around the target.

Seeming.name: Seeming
Seeming.desc: make any amount of creatures look differently  (1 ft shorter/taller, thin, fat, same body type).  Details are up to you.  If unwilling, CHA save negates. Others must touch targets or spend Action to make Investigation check vs your spell DC to see through illusion.

Skill Empowerment.name: Skill Empowerment
Skill Empowerment.desc: Creature gains expertise in skill of your choice (x2 proficiency)

Steel Wind Strike.name: Steel Wind Strike
Steel Wind Strike.desc: Make melee spell attack up to 5 creatures in range for 6d10 force damage, then teleport to empty space within 5ft of one of the targets.

Swift Quiver.name: Swift Quiver
Swift Quiver.desc: On each of your turns, use bonus action to make 2 attacks with weapon that uses ammo from quiver you touch. Quiver auto replaces ammo used with these attacks.

Synaptic Static.name: Synaptic Static
